scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Crucifixion of Christ, with Jesus on the cross in the center. To his left stands the Virgin Mary, clad in a blue mantle and praying with clasped hands. To his right is Saint John the Evangelist, also with hands clasped, wearing a pink and purple robe. In the background, a stylized cityscape with towers and buildings is visible, set against a green, hilly landscape with scattered trees. The scene is framed by an ornate border with floral and foliate motifs.
